sentences.en: Although these vegetables adapt well to our temperate climate, they tend to crop poorly.
sentences.cn: 虽然这些蔬菜作物很适应我们这里温和的气候，它们的收成却很差。

sentences.en: Buddhism had to adapt to the new world or perish.
sentences.cn: 佛教必须适应新时代，否则将会消亡。

sentences.en: He is going to adapt his play for television.
sentences.cn: 他想把他的剧本改编成电视剧.

sentences.en: It is through our nervous system that we adapt ourselves to our environment and to all external stimuli.
sentences.cn: 我们是通过神经系统使自己适应环境及所有外部刺激的。

sentences.en: Many children buy books after they have been adapted for television.
sentences.cn: 许多小孩子都是在书被改编成电视剧之后才去买的。

sentences.en: She knew how to adapt herself.
She lacked the ability to adapt easily.
Shelves were built to adapt the library for use as an office.
sentences.cn: 为将图书馆改作办公室而做了一些架子。

sentences.en: The ability to adapt is a definite asset in this job.
sentences.cn: 适应能力是做这份工作的绝对有利条件。

sentences.en: The scriptwriter helped him to adapt his novel for the screen.
sentences.cn: 编剧帮助他将其所著小说改编成电影。

sentences.en: The world will be different, and we will have to be prepared to adapt to the change.
sentences.cn: 世界会变得不同，我们必须做好准备以适应其变化。

sentences.en: They have had to adapt themselves to a war economy.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不适应战时经济。

sentences.en: We must constantly adapt and innovate to ensure success in a growing market.
sentences.cn: 我们必须不时地适应并创新，以确保在不断扩大的市场中取得成功。

sentences.en: When I adapt something I translate from one meaning to another as faithfully as I can.
sentences.cn: 我改编东西的时候，会尽可能忠实地将意思表达出来。

sentences.en: You should adapt yourself to the new environment.
Yulan magnolia can adapt to a variety of soils.
sentences.cn: 玉兰花能适应各种土壤.
